text: After surrendering so much to Trump during the NAFTA negotiations Trudeau failed to get Canada an exemption from the Buy American rules. Canadians are paying for his mistakes.https://twitter.com/CBCAlerts/status/1150858546474622976 …

Après avoir tant donné à Trump lors des négociations sur l’ALENA, Trudeau a échoué à obtenir une exemption des règles Buy American. Les Canadiens paient pour ses erreurs.https://twitter.com/CBCAlerts/status/1150858546474622976 …

Greens have been calling for an end to calf roping and chuck wagon races. Let 2019 be the last year the wonderful spirit of Calgary is marred by these deaths. #GPChttps://twitter.com/CamilleLabchuk/status/1150574671374495751 …

L’une des raisons des prix élevés du logement à Vancouver et Toronto est que les seuils d’immigration ne cessent d’augmenter, et plus de 41% des immigrants s’installent dans ces deux villes. Moins d’immigrants rendra le logement plus abordable.https://vancouversun.com/opinion/columnists/douglas-todd-what-would-happen-to-canadian-housing-if-immigration-stopped/ …

One of the main reasons for sky high house prices in Vancouver and Toronto is that immigration levels keep getting higher, and more than 41% of all immigrants head to these two cities. Fewer immigrants will make housing more affordable. https://vancouversun.com/opinion/columnists/douglas-todd-what-would-happen-to-canadian-housing-if-immigration-stopped/ …

It is great news that Maya and Marta have been found safe and will be reunited with their families. Thank you to @OPP_ER, @osarva and @Algonquin_PP staff for their tireless work.https://twitter.com/CBCAlerts/status/1150799478783447041 …

Excellente nouvelle d’apprendre que Maya et Marta ont été retrouvées saines et sauves et qu’elles seront réunies avec leur famille. Merci aux équipes de @OPP_ER @osarva et @Algonquin_PP pour leurs efforts acharnés.https://twitter.com/iciontario/status/1150803709850464259 …

Not only has the Trudeau government broken promises, they have made life more expensive for Canadians by raising taxes, forcing a carbon tax, and eliminating tax credits. Justin Trudeau is #NotAsAdvertised.https://twitter.com/CTVNews/status/1150722120969859072 …

Non seulement le gouvernement Trudeau a-t-il brisé ses promesses, il a également rendu la vie plus dispendieuse pour les Canadiens en augmentant les taxes, en imposant sa taxe sur le carbone et en éliminant les crédits d’impôt. Justin Trudeau n’est #PasCeQuilAvaitAnnoncé.https://twitter.com/CTVNews/status/1150722120969859072 …

Flying can be expensive and stressful, and you deserve to be treated with respect if your flight is overbooked, delayed, or something happens to your bags. That’s why we’ve implemented clear and fair air passenger rights – and they come into effect today.https://globalnews.ca/news/5494611/air-passenger-bill-or-rights/ …

Prendre l’avion peut être cher et stressant, et vous méritez d’être traité avec respect en cas de surréservation, de retard ou de problème de bagage. Alors, nous avons instauré des droits des passagers justes et clairs qui entrent en vigueur aujourd'hui.https://www.lapresse.ca/affaires/economie/201907/14/01-5233920-transport-aerien-nouvelles-compensations-pour-les-voyageurs.php …

Very sad news - James Duggan was a longtime champion for working people and advocate for the right to form and join Unions. My condolences go out to his loved ones, as well as to the other three families impacted by this devastating tragedy.https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/prominent-montreal-lawyer-james-duggan-among-victims-of-quebec-plane-crash-2 …

Today in Petawawa, Justin Trudeau will smile and pose for photo-ops, all while his meddling and political interference has created unprecedented chaos in the Canadian Armed Forces. He should use the visit as an opportunity to come clean. My statement: https://www.facebook.com/AndrewScheerMP/posts/2789249511108783 …

Aujourd’hui à Petawawa, Justin Trudeau va poser pour des photos alors que son ingérence politique a crée un chaos sans précédent dans les Forces armées canadiennes. Il devrait utiliser cette visite comme une occasion d’être clair. Ma déclaration: https://www.facebook.com/AndrewScheerMP/posts/2789249661108768 …

Starting today, new Air Passenger Rights set out rules to protect you when you travel: Clear communication about your rights Fair compensation for overbooked flights & lost or damaged baggage Better treatment during tarmac delayspic.twitter.com/vYBxayQE0s

À compter d’aujourd’hui, les nouveaux droits des passagers aériens définissent les règles qui protègent les voyageurs : Renseignements clairs sur vos droits Indemnisation juste pour les vols surréservés et la perte ou le bris de bagages Meilleur traitement lors des retardspic.twitter.com/taH4cGxID4

Triste nouvelle – James Duggan était un défenseur de longue date du mouvement syndical et un militant du droit de former des syndicats et d'y adhérer. Mes condoléances vont à ses proches, ainsi qu'aux trois autres familles touchées par cette tragédie.https://ici.radio-canada.ca/amp/1222486/james-duggan-ecrasement-avion-cabinet …
Un premier clin d’œil aux gens de la circonscription de Beloeil-Chambly où j’aurai l’immense plaisir d’être candidat pour le @blocquebecois pic.twitter.com/SOW0aNpHNh

Happy World Youth Skills Day! I've seen firsthand the passion & determination that drives young people across Canada & around the globe. You are the leaders of today, and our government will keep fighting for you – and with you – to build a better future.https://pm.gc.ca/eng/news/2019/07/15/statement-prime-minister-world-youth-skills-day …

Bonne Journée mondiale des compétences des jeunes! Je constate tous les jours la passion & la détermination des jeunes d’ici et d’ailleurs. Vous êtes les leaders d’aujourd’hui, et le gouvernement va se battre pour vous, avec vous, pour un avenir meilleur.https://pm.gc.ca/fra/nouvelles/2019/07/15/declaration-du-premier-ministre-loccasion-de-la-journee-mondiale-des …

Please do your homework. Your "of course" means you have not done so. No new pipelines. Period. Atlantic Canada can hugely reduce oil tankers by using Hibernia oil; ending foreign imports. #MissionPossible #GPChttps://twitter.com/TomPark1n/status/1150214586215391232 …

Are you fed up with constant hysterical media reporting about climate change? Climate alarmist are pushing many people, and particularly our kids, to despair. There is no emergency. It’s all based on flawed computer simulations. Relax and vote #PPC2019.https://youtu.be/l3Ve84pPs6o

Not true. We will cancel all fossil fuel subsidies. And ban fracking. We must respond to the climate emergency with serious plans to go off oil. Only the Greens are proposing what must be done. #GPChttps://twitter.com/RowlinsonNDP/status/1150257639592529920 …

That is absurd. We fought Energy East. Eastern Canada can reduce oil tankers by using Hibernia, for the few years left of using any oil. We oppose any new pipelines. Period. #GPC #climatehttps://twitter.com/TomPark1n/status/1150214586215391232 …

Not to mention that as a school trustee, you should know it is always good to do your homework. :) Greens are committed to 60% cuts in GHG by 2030. That means rapid reductions; zero expansion. #GPC #MissionPossible #climatehttps://twitter.com/ElizabethMay/status/1150580335282778112 …

What an incredible experience! Congratulations to the winner Simon Pagenaud and to all the other drivers for a great race. Our candidate Frank Fang and I really enjoyed being down in the pit lane as the athletes got ready at the @hondaindy.pic.twitter.com/npuuPln9Ya

Quelle expérience incroyable! Félicitations à Simon Pagenaud et à tous les autres pilotes pour la course. Notre candidat Frank Fang et moi avons adoré être à la ligne de départ alors que les athlètes se préparaient au @hondaindy.pic.twitter.com/8Oqed7uG9c

I hate to say it, but between you and Randall, you seem to be making the case that the NDP are getting desperate. I worked with you in Gary's office. You are better than this. #GPChttps://twitter.com/ryanlpainter/status/1150265226748731392 …

I am shocked you would spread misinformation. We have more than adequate domestic supply to stop foreign oil, while ramping down domestic production - and slashing demand by moving to EVs. Please do your homework before spreading lies. Read #MissionPossible. #GPChttps://twitter.com/ryanlpainter/status/1150265226748731392 …

Thank you. Just shocking that a fellow MP would claim Greens want expanded oil sands when we are completely against oil sands expansion. We oppose a single additional ounce of oil, coal, LNG expansion. We need to ramp down fast. #GPC #climatehttps://twitter.com/sarmcbride/status/1150281419039494144 …
